doc:
Louis Ducreux https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louis_Ducreux 0 Louis Ducreux (September 22, 1911- December 19, 1992) was a French actor, screenwriter and composer. He was born Louis Raymond Bordat in Marseille, France. He made his film debut in 1938 and worked until his death. He received a Best Actor nomination at the César Awards in 1985 for Bertrand Tavernier's A Sunday in the Country. He also worked on Max Ophüls's La Ronde as a composer. He died in Paris at the age of 81. Louis_Ducreux ( September_22_,_1911 - December_19_,_1992 ) was a_French_actor , screenwriter_and_composer . He was_born Louis_Raymond_Bordat in Marseille , France . He made his_film_debut in 1938 and worked until his_death . He received a_Best_Actor_nomination at the_César_Awards in 1985 for Bertrand_Tavernier 's_A_Sunday in the_Country . He also worked on Max_Ophüls 's_La_Ronde as a_composer . He died in Paris at the_age of 81 .
